source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_SEQ_00<tab>Keisetsu of Kugane has a task fit for an adventurer from abroad.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_SEQ_00<tab>クガネのケイセツは、異国の旅人に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_TODO_00<tab>Seek out merchants in Kugane from foreign lands, and see the draper sale missive to their hands.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_TODO_00<tab>異国の客を探し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_000<tab>Excuse me, you have the look of one who hails from a foreign land. If so, I believe you may be able to help me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_000あ、あの……あなた、異国からいらっしゃった方ですか？
それなら、お手伝いしていただきたいことがあるのですが、
話だけでも聞いていただけませんか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_001<tab>I am Keisetsu, servant to a mercantile house. I am charged with dispensing these missives to passersby. They tell of a grand sale my master is having on some very choice silks. Only, I cannot seem to get people to accept them from me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_001私は、さる商家の奉公人で、名をケイセツと申します。
特売の絹を宣伝するため、チラシを配る仕事を任されたのですが、
なかなか受け取ってもらえないのです……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_002<tab>My master and I wish nothing more than to sell our silks to those who visit Kugane from across the seas. But I fear they find me suspicious. If a fellow foreigner such as yourself were handing out the missives, they may be more inclined to take them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_002異国からいらした方に、絹を売りたいのに……。
でも、同じように外から来たあなたからなら、
受け取っていただけるかもしれません！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_003<tab>See these draper sale missives into the hands of any merchants visiting Kugane from abroad. I will see your labors rewarded.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_003「」を6枚ほど、クガネを訪れている、
「異国のお客様」に配っていただけませんか？
どうか、お願いいたします。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_004<tab>See six of my draper sale missives into the hands of any foreign merchants visiting Kugane from abroad. I will see your labors rewarded.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_004「」を6枚、クガネを訪れている、
「異国のお客様」に配っていただけませんか？
どうか、お願いいたします。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTA02813_000_011<tab>Ah, I do believe I've seen this missive before. There was a small child handing out the very same one. I thought it to be a farce or some other small matter.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTA02813_000_011このチラシ、どっかで見たことあるな。
ひょっとして、小さな子どもが配ってたやつか。
何かの遊びだと思ってたけど……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTA02813_000_012<tab>Intriguing. It says here that silks of the finest quality are available at a fraction of the market price. I shall go and see these wares for myself. Thank you, stranger.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTA02813_000_012ここに書いてあるとおりなら、絹の質は良さそうだな。
後で店に行って覗いてみるか。
アンタ、ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTB02813_000_014<tab>This is the same missive a child was handing out down by the port. I confess, I am very much interested in the finest of silks, but the child did not give the finest of impressions.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTB02813_000_014このチラシ……港で子どもが配ってたものでしょ。
商品は気になっていたけど、買う気はないわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTB02813_000_015<tab>What kind of shop would see fit to put such a youngling to work? I have reservations about the integrity of this Kugane.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTB02813_000_015あんな小さな子を働かせるなんて、
クガネの人は、どういうつもりなのかしら。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_016<tab>What is it? I'm busy. State your business, and quickly. Else leave me be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_016なんだ？　私は今、忙しいんだ。
まったく……クガネってやつは、せわしない街だな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_017<tab>Hmph, truth be told, soon as folk in Kugane catch word that you're a merchant, they never let you be. Damn annoying it is. But if you're saying there's business to be done here, I'll go and have myself a look.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_017ここじゃ、商人とわかると、ひっきりなしに話しかけられる。
相手をするのも面倒だったが……商売となれば話は別だ。
見せてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_018<tab>A sale, is it? I do like the sound of that. The silks of Kugane are much desired across the seas. I'll pay this shop a visit. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTC02813_000_018ほう……特売の情報とは、気が利くな。
クガネの絹布はよく売れるし、一度店に顔を出してみよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_019<tab>Yes, yes, yes, how may I help? Have you come to me on some business?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_019<tab>はいはい、商売のお話でしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_020<tab>Silks on sale!? That is a most welcome delight to my ears. Ah, yes, this missive. I have seen its like before. Is it not the same that a young boy is distributing?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_020絹の特売とは、嬉しいですねぇ。
おや……このチラシ、見覚えがありますよ。
男の子が配っていたものですよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_021<tab>Oh my, that is a surprise indeed. To think that such a young child was actually working. I thought him at some play or prank. Do the merchants of Kugane start their trade at such a young age? I find that both inspiring and admirable.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTD02813_000_021ひょっとしてあの子、ほんとに仕事してたんですか。
クガネでは、あんな小さい子でも、商売人なんですねぇ。
いやぁ……感心、感心。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_022<tab>What is it? Can't you see I'm busy. Someone has to study the market here.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_022<tab>なんだ？　市場の調査で忙しいんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_023<tab>A missive for a silk sale? Aye, these prices look choice enough. I wonder if there was room yet on my barge for a few more crates.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_023特売のチラシか。
値段は魅力的だが、船に載せる余裕があったかな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_024<tab>I suppose there is always room enough for a few select pieces for the wife. Thank you for the missive, friend.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTE02813_000_024いや……せっかくだから、妻に反物でも買ってやるか。
よい情報を、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_025<tab>You don't look to be a merchant. What can I do for you?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_025<tab>あなた、商人には見えないけど、何かご用？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_026<tab>This is the second such missive I've received, but I shall take it all the same. Still, I must say, you do not look as one meant to be handing out missives. You look as though you should be leading a van on the field of battle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_026これで2枚目だけど、まあいいわ。
でもあなた、丁稚の仕事をするようには見えないわね。
見た目はまるで、立派な武人だもの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_027<tab>Forgive me, I shall speculate no more. The paths we tread in life are all our own. Continue to tread yours as you see fit, and tread it well, friend. Good day.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_MERCHANTF02813_000_027あら、ごめんなさい……これ以上詮索はしないわ。
人生、何があるかわからないものね。
それでは、ごきげんよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_030<tab>You were able to give away all of the missives? I am glad to hear it, but... Why will people not take them from me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_030すべて配っていただけたようですね。
しかし……いったい私の何が、悪かったんでしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_A1_000_032<tab>Many were opposed to the thought of child labor.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_A1_000_032<tab>子どもを働かせるのに反対だから

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_B1_000_033<tab>Many thought you were merely a child at play.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_B1_000_033<tab>子どもが遊んでいると思われたから

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_034<tab>I see... I hadn't thought it a problem of age. It is quite normal in Hingashi for a child to work. I suppose the same cannot be said of the lands from which these travelers come.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_034そ、そうだったんですか……。
年齢が問題だとは、思いもしませんでした。
ひんがしの国では普通ですが、異国では違うのでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_035<tab>My house is by no means a rich one. I've a younger brother and sister to provide for. And handing out these missives is the only work I am able to do.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_035しかし、私の家は決して裕福ではないので、
妹や弟のためにも、仕事をやめるわけにはいきません。
まだチラシ配りすら、まともにはできませんが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_036<tab>I dream of opening my own shop someday. I will steal the wisdom and tricks of my master. I will learn the tongues of faraway lands. I will─ Oh, I'm sorry. I shouldn't say such things aloud. Here, take this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_036ですが、私には店を構えるという夢があります。
ゆくゆくは異国の言葉を覚え、ご主人様の技を盗み……。
おっと、それよりも、これを受け取ってください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_037<tab>You did me a service, and for that I must pay you. I could hardly hope of becoming a merchant without knowing that much. Thank you, traveler.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ710_02813_KEISETSU_000_037仕事をお願いしたのだから、謝礼を支払うのは当然です。
これでも、私は商売人を目指しているのですからね。
異国の旅の方……ありがとうございました。
